headline: Eyeing Costs, Universities Opened Up, Then Left Students on Their Own
text: LONDON — Inside a dormitory now known by students as H.M.P., for Her Majesty’s Prison, trash piled up in shared kitchens. Students washed their clothes in bathroom sinks. Security guards stalked the gates, keeping anyone from leaving or entering.
snippet: With no bailout forthcoming from the government, financially strapped British universities beckoned students back to campus, with predictably dire results.
